name: MbedTLSClient
description: A straightforward TLS/SSL client for Arduino platforms (like ESP32) that use a built-in mbedTLS library. It's designed to wrap any underlying Arduino Client object (e.g., WiFiClient, EthernetClient, TinyGsmClient) to provide a secure TLS connection.
keywords: tls, ssl, mbedtls, esp32, security, mqtt, https, client, arduino, tinyssm, sim7600
